name: Australia
overview: Australia is a leading global study destination, renowned for its world-class education, safe and welcoming environment, multicultural society, and internationally recognized qualifications. With top-ranked universities, industry-focused programs, and excellent post-study opportunities, Australia offers students the perfect balance of academic excellence, global exposure, and a high quality of life.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: World-Class Universities
whyStudyInAustralia.description: Australia is home to globally ranked universities such as the University of Melbourne, Australian National University, and the University of Sydney, offering internationally recognized qualifications.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: Globally Recognized Degrees
whyStudyInAustralia.description: Australian degrees are respected worldwide and valued by employers for their strong academic standards, practical approach, and industry relevance.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: Post-Study Work Opportunities
whyStudyInAustralia.description: International students can stay and work in Australia after graduation through post-study work visas, gaining valuable international work experience.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: Multicultural & Safe Environment
whyStudyInAustralia.description: Australia is a safe and welcoming country with students from over 190 countries, offering a multicultural lifestyle and strong support for international students.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: Work While Studying
whyStudyInAustralia.description: International students are allowed to work part-time during their studies and full-time during scheduled breaks to help manage living expenses.

whyStudyInAustralia.title: High-Quality Education System
whyStudyInAustralia.description: The Australian education system emphasizes practical learning, innovation, research, and industry-focused training to prepare students for global careers.

eligibility.notes: Some courses may require work experience

work_rights: Up to 24 hours per week during study and unlimited hours during scheduled breaks
